name: Sauerkraut
description:
## Sauerkraut

Fermented Cabbage! Owning this item unlocks fields and new seeds.

You can craft this at the Kitchen in the game.

## Supply

Unlimited

### Crafting Costs

---

SFL
10 Cabbage
